value.author: did:plc:vzsvtbtbnwn22xjqhcu3vd6y
value.content:
ssh, shellを多用するからIDEは向かない。
今おすすめな開発環境ってある?何が注目されているのかな。

en.content:
Since I make extensive use of SSH and shell commands, IDEs don't really suit my needs.
What are some good development environments recommended these days? What technologies are gaining attention?
